summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4554 for the improvement of the alley in block 25, Brooklyn Addition, being the alley between University Way and 15th Avenue Northeast, from East 40th Street to East Pacific Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53255, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
